dimensions.label: Clarity
dimensions.description: The message is easy to understand and not ambiguous about what is being asked.

anchors.meaning: Crystal clear; single reading; explicit ask and next step.

dimensions.label: Strategy alignment
dimensions.description: The message follows the chosen strategy (anchor, question-first, packaging, etc.).

dimensions.label: Tone
dimensions.description: Tone matches risk profile and channel; firm without being antagonistic unless intentionally.

dimensions.label: Justification
dimensions.description: Uses objective criteria or credible rationale where appropriate.

anchors.meaning: Some rationale; could be more objective.
Strong objective support; concise and relevant.

dimensions.label: Next step control
dimensions.description: Asks a calibrated question or proposes a clear next step with timing.

anchors.meaning: No next step; leaves ball in the air.
Clear next step with question or scheduling suggestion.
